name: Square Heart Demo
description:
Precision platformer with minimalist graphics with each level crafted with love and care. A humble pack of challenging difficulty and coherent story for you.

This build is not full demo yet. It'll receive at least 4 updates to become a complete demo soon™.
Upcoming updates: 

  1. Quality of Life update   ✓
  2. Parallax background and foreground update
  3. Challenger's update

Please follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SquareHeartGame
